member_organisations: We are a company and do not have member organizations.
fields_of_interest: Culture and media, Competition, Employment and Social Affairs, Business and Industry, Research and innovation, Digital economy and society, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: Polices relating to innovation, particularly in software and related AI technology, and policies related to technology startups, investment and fostering a European startup ecosystem.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: A software company (startup) applying advanced AI technology to help companies, banks and government agencies work with massive volumes of unstructured data (text, image, voice, video) for business research and knowledge management, and for cybersecurity.
relevant_communication: None, other than past participation in a German trade mission for startups and in followup discussions with German policymakers.
